message.subject: Conf. Call re: California
message.content:
M1.1. Rick would like to schedule a 90 minute conference call regarding
"California: A midcourse assessment of the campaign".
[Inform: Rick would like to schedule a conference call regarding an assessment of a campaign in California]
M1.2. Please respond "ASAP"
which dates/times listed below will work best with your schedules. [Y]
[Request-Action: respond with which dates of the following are best for recipients' schedules]
Flink1.2
M1.3. Thursday, March 22 11:00am-12:30pm (CST)
M1.4. Friday, March 23 10:30am - 12:00pm (CST)
M1.5. 12:00pm - 1:30pm (CST)
M1.6. 3:30pm - 5:00pm (CST)
[Inform: possible dates and times for conference call]
M1.7. gngr
[Conventional: signature]
M1.8. 713-853-7751
[Inform: Ginger's phone number]

message.subject: Conf. Call re: California
message.content:
M2.1. Thursday and Friday at 10:30 AM.
[Inform: Jeff prefers Thursday and/or Friday at 10:30 AM]
Blink1.2
